name: PII
description: Personally Identifiable Information information that, when used alone or with other relevant data, can identify an individual.

children.name: NonSensitive
children.description: PII which is easily accessible from public sources and can include zip code, race, gender, and date of birth.

children.name: Sensitive
children.description: PII which if lost, compromised, or disclosed without authorization, could result in substantial harm, embarrassment, inconvenience, or unfairness to an individual.
